name: Bateau dress
description:
Lovely boat neck dress with princess seams and full skirt falling below the knee.

Gorgeous (modern fabric) vintage style print of spots and florals in blue on a cream background.   This style of dress and print reminds me of Audery Hepburn in her heyday.

This is made from 100% cotton poplin, a crisp medium weight fabric the bodice of which is lined in soft cotton voile.

Features a V back and a concealed zip closure.

This dress is a one of a kind in Size 12.  Please refer to the size chart tab at the top of this page for more information.

This style will be available in sizes 8-20, in a variety of vintage and new fabrics.  Please feel free to enquiry about pre-orders and custom made pieces at nin@sailorspy.co.nz.

name: Brightwater blouse
description:
This bib front sleeveless blouse is perfect for hot sticky days or layer it up with a cardi.

Shaped through the side seam, it can be worn tucked into a skirt for work or left out over jeans or shorts for a more casual look.  

It features a back yoke with gentle gathers and a delicate modern print of abstract flowers on a white background.

100% Cotton
One of a kind - size 12


I have another of these blouses to list in a size 8 and can make this to order in a range of vintage and new fabrications.  

To enquiry, email me nin@sailorspy.co.nz

name: Rabbit Island Shorts
description:
Limited edition high waisted shorts featuring scallop hem and a double row of vintage metal buttons.

100% cotton French ticking in cream and denim blue.  Gorgeous in winter with textured tights and boots.

This style is pictured on the model in another fabrication, sorry that's sold out.

Ready to ship:

Size 8 (actual garment measures 66cm at the waist, 98 hip)
Size 10 (actual garment measures 72cm at the waist, 102 hip) 
Size 12 (actual garment measures 78cm at the waist, 106 hip)
Size 14 (actual garment measures 83cm at the waist, 111 hip)


Model pictured has a 74cm waist and 100cm hip.

Designed and made in Christchurch, New Zealand

name: Shift in Peony
description:
This cute and easy to wear shift is styled in vintage cotton

Features my tried and true shift block with wide front bib detail, picked out with grey cotton binding; and little tucks into the skirt to provide easy of movement.

Cut to just above the knee - can be worn on its own or over skinny jeans, leggings or tailored shorts. 

Cut in a limited edition of two and offered at a very special price (owning to the fact that top quality vintage fabric is rare) I have two available.  

Alternatively you can purchase a custom made shift in the fabric pictured.  I make in sizes 8 - 20.  Please ensure you include your email details in the checkout process.  I shall be in touch to confirm turnaround times - but I expect to have this item out to you within 3-5 working days

name: Weekender Blouse - Violet Houses
description:
A light weigh cotton voile top with contrast microdot yoke.  Features hand covered coordinating fabric buttons, sleeves to keep off the sun.  Style is fitted through the bust and has gentle gathers for a loose look.  It finishes on the hip.

One off piece - size 10.  

I am making these to order in custom fabric combinations, please contact me nin@sailorspy.co.nz if you're interested.

name: Shift in Quince
description:
This cute and easy to wear shift is styled in vintage cotton

Features my tried and true shift block with wide front bib detail, picked out with grey cotton binding; and little tucks into the skirt to provide easy of movement.

Cut to just above the knee - can be worn on its own or over skinny jeans, leggings or tailored shorts. 

Cut in a limited edition of three and offered at a very special price (owning to the fact that top quality vintage fabric is rare) I have two available.  

Alternatively you can purchase a custom made shift in the fabric pictured.  I make in sizes 8 - 20.  Please ensure you include your email details in the checkout process.  I shall be in touch to confirm turnaround times - but I expect to have this item out to you within 3-5 working days

name: Shift in Paua
description:
This cute and easy to wear shift is styled in vintage cotton is a one off piece in this fabric - size 12.

Features my tried and true shift block with wide front bib detail, picked out with grey cotton binding; and little tucks into the skirt to provide easy of movement.

Cut to just above the knee - can be worn on its own or over skinny jeans, leggings or tailored shorts. 

A one off piece in size 12 and offered at a very special price (owning to the fact that top quality vintage fabric is rare).  

Alternatively you can inquire about a custom made shift.  I make in sizes 8 - 20.  Please ensure you include your email details in the checkout process.  I shall be in touch to confirm turnaround times - but I expect to have this item out to you within 3-5 working days

name: Lemon Sorbet shift
description:
This cute and easy to wear shift in vintage cotton is a taste of things to come for Sailor Spy Summer 2013/14!

Features my tried and true shift block with wide front bib detail, picked out with grey cotton binding; and little tucks into the skirt to provide easy of movement.

Cut to just above the knee - can be worn on its own or over skinny jeans, leggings or tailored shorts. 

Cut in a limited edition of two and offered at a very special price (owning to the fact that top quality vintage fabric is rare) I have two available.  

Alternatively you can purchase a custom made shift in the fabric pictured.  I make in sizes 8 - 20.  Please ensure you include your email details in the checkout process.  I shall be in touch to confirm turnaround times - but I expect to have this item out to you within 3-5 working days

name: Blue ombre print maxi
description:
This gorgeous floaty number is just the thing for warm summer days.  Dressy and comfortable - its sure to be a summer holiday staple.

Design features beautiful limited edition Ombre print cotton/silk with a subtle sheen.  Empire style, and halter neck.  The back has an invisible zip and is elasticated for the perfect.

Cotton/silk - this fabrication is semi sheer.  I have deliberately left it unlined so as not to add extra bulk to the waist.  This style looks great with boyleg shorts or you may want to wear a half slip.

Size 10 read to ship.  Custom orders available size 10-16

name: Weekender Blouse
description:
A light weigh cotton top with contrast microdot yoke.  Features hand covered coordinating fabric buttons, sleeves to keep off the sun.  Style is fitted through the bust and has gentle gathers for a loose look.  It finishes on the hip.

Limited run from vintage fabric.  

I am making these to order in custom fabric combinations, please contact me nin@sailorspy.co.nz if you're interested.

name: Oh Daisy! knit top
description:
Feel like channelling Daisy Buchanan?

This one of a kind piece is a modern take on Gatsby glam.

It has been crafted from a deep mauve knit with a hint of sparkle.  Its trimmed with stretch silk sleeves and epaulets.

With its wide slash neckline and deep sleeves it drapes beautifully around the arms and gently down to a wide stretchy waistband.


Size/fit - easy fit, best for an 8-10.  Garment sits on the waist.

100% viscose knit with silk/elastane trim

name: Drape flapper dress
description:
Draped evening dress in cool and floating cotton voile with eye catching bronze embroidery and sequins.  

Features elasticated waist and bound cutouts to enable you to belt the style if you wish.

Black cotton voile

Limited edition in this fabric!

Size small is ready to ship.  
Custom orders available Size X-small -Large

name: Limited Edition - Tahunanui shift
description:
Versatile shift features an intricate tucking detail across the bib and pockets using artist Malka Dubrawsky's fabric.  Limited edition of 3 garments, see below for sizes.

This garment is semi tailored – fitted through the top and loose through the waist and hip, although there is subtle shaping through the sides.  Please use your bust measurement as a guide when ordering.

Third photo is to indicate the style only.

Great with leggings and boots for winter, sandals for summer.

Modal/Cotton.  Fully washable. 

Made in New Zealand.

name: Tahunanui Shift - granite
description:
Beautiful modal/cotton shift features an intricate tucking detail across the bib.  The feel of this fabric is soft, almost like peach skin.

I was inspired to create this detail by observing the way wind plays over fields of long grass.  

This garment is semi tailored – fitted through the top and loose through the waist and hip, although there is subtle shaping through the sides.  Please use your bust measurement as a guide when ordering.

The third photo indicates style only.

Great with leggings and boots for winter or sandals and a statement necklace for summer.

Modal/Cotton.  Fully washable. 

Sizes 10-16 are ready to ship.  
Sizes 8, 18 and 20 can be made to order.  Please allow an additional 3 days for delivery.

Made in New Zealand.

name: Kisses skirt
description:
Reduced - was $129 now $89

A flattering little everyday skirt in soft and thick cotton/spandex. 

Colourways:  Black or Navy

Designed to sit on your lower waist (around your navel), the skirt features deep box pleats and sashiko stitched detail at the hem (this is made by hand).

Measurements LOWER WAIST (hip is free on all sizes)

10 - 90cm
12 - 95cm
14 - 100cm
16 - 105cm
18 - 110cm

Cotton/Elastane.  Fully washable.
Made in New Zealand.

name: Brief Encounter Dress
description:
A favourite dress here at Sailor Spy, we've updated this timeless style with two new colours...jewel and red zone.

1940's inspired mock wrap front dress.  

The medium weight fabric drapes beautifully from the waist and the cleverly designed waist panels and gathers along the back are positioned to nip in the waist.  

A great style for a bigger bust, this piece is made in easy care viscose knit.  It dries quickly and requires no ironing. Length 91cm shoulder to hem.  

100% viscose. (Please note: Long black colourway only is 100% polyester knit).

Made in New Zealand

Please note there are no custom orders available at this time.

name: Atmore Silk Tank
description:
Now half price - was $89 now $45

A pretty semi-sheer silk tank.  Features French seam detail front and back and hand cut coordinating binding around arms and neckline.  A great layering piece for winter - silk when teamed with merino is warm and yet breathes, giving you ultimate comfort.

Pure silk.  Handwash or dryclean.  Made in New Zealand

Sizes small and medium are ready to ship.  When selecting your size, please consult the size chart and choose according to your bust measurement.

name: Dovedale Dress
description:
Last sizes reduced from $139

This lovely dress is a tran-seasonal treasure!  It features a ruffles at the shoulder and hem and an intricate tucking detail across the bib.  I was inspired to create this detail by observing  the way wind plays over fields of long grass.  

This garment is semi tailored – fitted through the top and loose through the waist and hip, although there is subtle shaping through the sides and darts through the back..  Please use your bust measurement as a guide when ordering.

Length – shoulder to hem 101cm.  

Size 10, 14 and 16 only.

Cotton/Linen.  Fully washable.  Made in New Zealand

name: Cleveland Leather collar
description:
Half price!  Was $30 now $15

This collar or neckpiece is handcut and punched from softest leather with a subtle pearlised sheen.  It's finished with a vintage white glass button.

There are grograin ribbon ties at the back so that you can pop it on over any plain top and get the peter pan look.  Can be worn high or low.

Ready to ship

Spot clean with a damp cloth as required.  Polishing with leather conditional from time to time will keep it looking nice.  Do not immerse in water.

Made in New Zealand

name: Rainy Friday Night Dress
description:
SALE  - was $189 **Limited run - last pieces**

A relaxed fit sleeveless dress with darted bodice, pleat detail at the neck and deep box pleats.  The back features a button closure at the neck and deep slit.  Invisible zip.  The hem is completed with sweet embroidered detail. 

Please note that this is a relaxed fit and therefore generous through the waist.

100% Cotton.  Fully washable.

Made in New Zealand

name: Sherbourne Skirt
description:
Beautiful tailored and fully lined high waisted wool blend pencil skirt.

This sexy skirt is dressy enough for work or an evening out and features slant pockets, centre back invisible zip and a back which allows easy of movement, while keeping the overall silhouette narrow.

The garment is fully tailored, please check the waist and hip measurements before ordering.  

Dry clean or handwash.  Made in New Zealand

name: Sailor Spy Gift Voucher - $150
description:
Stuck for ideas?  Why not a gift voucher.  

These vouchers are available for redemption online and in-store.  They must be used within 12 months of the date of purchase.

Available in various pre-determined denominations, or message me nin@sailorspy.co.nz for a custom voucher with the amount of you're choosing.

Available as either an electronic gift or as a hard copy posted to you.*

*please supply the name, email address and postal address (as required) of the recipient upon checkout.
